title: Weekly Energy Brief
summary: Key moves in crude, gas, and products — concise and actionable.
content_html: Front-month crude held firm as spreads tightened. Gas balances improved on cooler forecasts. Product cracks softened into the weekend.

title: EU Carbon: Q4 Setup
summary: Options skew leans bullish; auction supply cadence in focus.
content_html: Risk reversals flipped positive as traders positioned for tighter balances. Compliance buying remained steady.

title: Bank Earnings Snapshot
summary: NII compression moderates; credit metrics resilient across large caps.
content_html: Loan growth slowed but deposit costs also stabilized. Capital ratios improved modestly on retained earnings.
